name: Class Control.Type
text: An instance of the Type class represents the type of the control.
codes:
public static class Control.Type
extends Object

methods.description:
Indicates whether the specified object is equal to this control type,
 returning true if the objects are the same.
Returns a hash code value for this control type.

Provides the String representation of the control type. This
 String is the same name that was passed to the constructor.
